name: worst physics game ever made
description:
i made this game just to test if i was mentally able to "make" a game, i saw a tutorial on yt and decided to make one, it isn't all copied but the scripts are lol. 

Probably  i'll make a similiar game in the future, or something cooler/playable idk

the game is just 600kb so if you don't have a potato pc i guess you can play it lol
